items.sentence: I really feel like I learned something worthwhile today.
Tom used to come over all the time and hang out with us.
Tom waited for Mary in front of the library all morning.
Let\'s go over to Tom\'s house and see what he\'s doing.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to see or speak to anyone.
Have you seen the Christmas lights the neighbors put up?
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to be in Boston all week?
How could you agree to doing that without consulting me?
I suspect Tom and Mary are planning to do that together.
I wasn\'t able to understand what Tom was trying to say.
